item.title: Bluetooth Speaker Output (only)
item.dc:creator: mcolonj
item.description:
Hi,

I want to give a presentation using open ears. The presentation calls for using bluetooth audio. I would like to hold the device while speaking into the built-in mic. Then I would like to have the output play through a bluetooth speaker.

I am guessing there is a way to do this. However, I am unable to find a solution.

Can you help with this?

item.title: Reply To: Bluetooth Speaker Output (only)
item.dc:creator: Halle Winkler
item.description:
Welcome,

If it is supported it should automatically work, so it sounds a bit like it isn’t and in that case you’d probably need to experiment a bit with the settings inside AudioSessionManager.h and recompile the framework.
